form.title: Concussion History
form.desc: Please answer the following questions about your injury and leave any necessary comments.

questions.question: How did you get your injury?

options.text: Frozen ground (e.g. ice rink, ski/snowboarding trail, etc.)

answers.text: Hit on head with moving object

options.text: Sports equipment (e.g. hockey stick, golf club, etc.)

questions.question: Were you wearing a helmet when you were injured?
Were you wearing any other form of headgear when you were injured?
Do you have full recollection of the events?
Have you ever had any prior concussions?

options.text: If yes, please list dates and describe the details, setting sin which it happened, and how long it took for you to recover

questions.question: Have you ever had any symptoms that may have resulted from a head injury?

options.text: If yes, please list the dates and describe the details and setting in which it happened

form.title: Symptoms
form.desc: Please indicate any symptoms you experienced regularly at any time prior to your injury (pre-injury) and symptoms you experienced after your injury (post-injury). Leave any necessary comments.

answers.text: If so, what medications are you taking and how often?
If so, have you been napping and how much?

form.title: Past Medical History
form.desc: Please answer the following questions about your past medical history and leave any necessary comments.

options.text: Please specify at how many weeks of gestation

questions.question: Did you reach developmental milestones growing up?

form.title: Menstrual History
form.desc: Please answer the following questions about your menstrual history and leave any necessary comments. Please note any changes in your menstrual cycle from before your injury (pre-injury) to after your injury (post-injury).

questions.question: Have you missed any periods recently? (since last check-in)

options.text: If yes, how many and when?

form.title: Recovery Activities
form.desc: Please answer the following questions about your recovery period and leave any necessary comments. If your recovery was longer than four weeks, base your answers on the first four weeks of your recovery.

questions.question: How long after your injury did you return to practice or play of a sport?
On average, how many hours per night do you sleep?
Did you miss any school or work?

options.text: If yes, how many days (including half days)?

questions.question: Were you given work to complete? (i.e. schoolwork, homework , or work responsibilies)

options.text: If yes, did you complete it?

questions.question: Did you use your cell phone for anything other than phone calls? (e.g. texting, social media, apps, etc.)
Did you play video, phone, or computer games?
Did you use the computer for leisure?
Did you use the computer for work?
Did you do any leisurely reading? (e.g. books, magazines, etc.)

options.text: If yes, what source did you use?

questions.question: Did you do any work-related reading? (e.g. homework, articles, research, etc.)

options.text: If yes, what source did you use?

questions.question: Did you listen to audio books, talk radio, or podcasts?

options.text: If yes, did you use headphones?
If yes, did you use headphones?
If yes, how many at a time?

questions.question: Did you attend any social or work-related events?

options.text: If yes, what was the event? Include the date and length of the event
If yes, how long was your travel time?

questions.question: Did you walk for more than 5 minutes per day?
Did you exercise? (e.g. running, swimming, biking, sports, treadmill, sexual intercourse, or another form of exercise)
Did you carry heavy items during your recovery?

options.text: If yes, please list the items and estimate the weight

questions.question: Did you do any household chores?

form.title: Additional Information
form.desc: Please answer these questions so we can get additional information we may need.

questions.question: What sports have you played in the past?

answers.text: Married or in a domestic partnership

questions.question: Is there anything you would like us to know about your concussion or concussion recovery?
